reservation

Class ReservationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • reservation.ReservationController

  • public class ReservationController
extends java.lang.Object

    Reservation Controller

    This controller class makes use of Reservation Entity class to do simple CRUD operations.
    Since:
    2018-04-12
    Version:
    1.0

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.util.List<Reservation> reservationList
      The list of reservation objects in the data file

      static Reservation getReservationByCode(java.lang.String reservationCode)
      Returns reservation object using the primary key of Reservation Entity, reservationCode

      Returns reservation object using guestPassport
      static java.util.List<Reservation> getReservationByRoomNo(java.lang.String roomNo)
      Returns list of reservation objects using roomNo
      static Reservation getReservationByRoomNo(java.lang.String roomNo, java.lang.String status)
      Returns reservation object using roomNo and status of the room which will only return one object if status is "Checked In"

      Removes the reservation object from the data file

      • getReservationByRoomNo

        public static Reservation getReservationByRoomNo(java.lang.String roomNo,
                                                 java.lang.String status)
        Returns reservation object using roomNo and status of the room which will only return one object if status is "Checked In"
        Parameters:
        roomNo - Room number of reservation
        status - Status of reservation
        Returns:
        Returns reservation object from roomNo and status

      • removeReservation

        public static boolean removeReservation(Reservation reservation)
        Removes the reservation object from the data file
        Parameters:
        reservation - Reservation object to be removed
        Returns:
        Returns true if reservation object is removed form data file, else returns false

      • retrieveReservationList

        public static java.util.List<Reservation> retrieveReservationList()
        Reads the reservation data file and returns it in a list format
        Returns:
        Returns the list of Reservation Entity objects in the data file

      • updateReservationList

        public static boolean updateReservationList(Reservation reservation)
        Creates or updates the reservation object into the data file
        Parameters:
        reservation - Reservation object to be created or updated
        Returns:
        Returns true if data file is updated, else returns false

      • updateRoom

        public static boolean updateRoom(Reservation reservation)
        Checks the status of the reservation object and updated the room status accordingly
        Parameters:
        reservation - Reservation object to update room status
        Returns:
        Returns true if room is updated, else returns false
